QuestionStem: The photos show images observed at three different scales.

images.caption: Gorillas – no magnification
images.altText: In this photograph, a gorilla and its infant are shown as they would appear if observed by the unaided eye.

images.caption: Cells – 50x magnification
images.altText: In this magnified image, cells are shown 50 times larger than their actual size. Internal cell structures are not visible in this image.

images.caption: Cells – 2,210x magnification
images.altText: In this magnified image, cells are shown 2,210 times larger than their actual size. Structures inside the cells are visible at this magnification.
